original_title: 星街すいせい 2ndライブ "Shout in Crisis"
overview: A girl appears like a comet, shining small and bright. Her glorious singing voice overlaps with more than a million stars. Finally, the second stage arrives. Hoshimachi Suisei 2nd solo live, "Shout in Crisis". Let's observe together a dreamlike moment spent in the galaxy. Features old favorites from her first album "Still Still Stellar" and many new hits from her 2nd album "Specter"!
title: Hoshimachi Suisei 2nd Solo Live "Shout in Crisis"
